trans-unit.source: Represents an expression activity editor.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个表达式活动编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Expressions.ExpressionActivityEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Expressions.ExpressionActivityEditor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression activity accepts returns.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示表达式活动是否接受 Return 键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the expression activity accepts returns; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式活动接受返回，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the AcceptsReturn dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 AcceptsReturn 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression activity accepts tabs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示表达式活动是否接受 Tab 键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the expression activity accepts tabs; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式活动接受选项卡，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the AcceptsTab dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 AcceptsTab 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Begins an edit.
trans-unit.target: 开始编辑。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the expression activity editor can be committed.
trans-unit.target: 指示表达式活动编辑器是否可以提交 。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression activity editor can be committed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式活动编辑器可以设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the commit is explicit; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该提交已显式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the expression activity editor is committed.
trans-unit.target: 指示表达式活动编辑器是否被提交。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression activity editor is committed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置表达式活动编辑器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing context of the expression activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取表达式活动的编辑上下文。

trans-unit.source: The editing context of the expression activity.
trans-unit.target: 编辑上下文的表达式活动。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the commit is explicit.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示分配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the commit is explicit; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果提交为显式，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the ExplicitCommit dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 ExplicitCommit 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表达式活动。

trans-unit.source: The expression activity.
trans-unit.target: 表达式活动。

trans-unit.source: Represents the Expression dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示表达式依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression type activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表达式类型活动。

trans-unit.source: The expression type activity.
trans-unit.target: 表达式的类型活动。

trans-unit.source: Represents the ExpressionType dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 ExpressionType 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The property of the editor to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的编辑器的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the expression activity editor using the specified target.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目标，获取表达式活动编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The expression activity editor.
trans-unit.target: 表达式操作编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hint text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The hint text.
trans-unit.target: 提示文本。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HintText dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 HintText 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal scroll bar visibility.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置水平滚动条的可见性。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scroll bar visibility.
trans-unit.target: 水平滚动条可见性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HorizontalScrollBarVisibility dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 HorizontalScrollBarVisibility 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression activity is an independent expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示表达式活动是否为独立表达式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression activity is an independent expression; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式活动是独立表达式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the IsIndependentExpression dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 IsIndependentExpression 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression activity is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示表达式活动是否是只读的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the expression activity is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式活动是只读，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the IsReadOnly dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 IsReadOnly 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression is supported.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示是否支持表达式的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the expression is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式受支持，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the IsSupportedExpression dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 IsSupportedExpression 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the owner activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所有者活动。

trans-unit.source: The owner activity.
trans-unit.target: 所有者活动。

trans-unit.source: Represents the OwnerActivity dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 OwnerActivity 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to argument.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置参数的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to argument.
trans-unit.target: 参数的路径。

trans-unit.source: Represents the PathToArgument dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 PathToArgument 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The property of the editor to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的编辑器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the editor.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the expression activity editor using the specified target and name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目标和名称，设置表达式活动编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses the location expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示此实例是否使用位置表达式的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the instance uses the location expression; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例使用位置表达式，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the UseLocationExpression dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 UseLocationExpression 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical scrollbar visibility.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置垂直滚动条的可见性。

trans-unit.source: The vertical scrollbar visibility.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the VerticalScrollBarVisibility dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 VerticalScrollBarVisibility 依赖项属性。
